data.eml:eml: Taxonomic revision of the crab spider genus Epicadus Simon, 1895 (Arachnida: Araneae: Thomisidae) with notes on related genera of Stephanopinae Simon, 1895

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Silva-Moreira, Thiago Da, Machado, Miguel (2016): Taxonomic revision of the crab spider genus Epicadus Simon, 1895 (Arachnida: Araneae: Thomisidae) with notes on related genera of Stephanopinae Simon, 1895. Zootaxa 4147 (3): 281-310, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4147.3.4
